name: Intel® RealSense™ Technology - ROS Interface
tagline: Experimental support for Intel® RealSense™ Technology to the Robotic Operation System (ROS)
body:
In order to enable new, compelling usages within the robotics ecosystem, Intel is providing access to both of its longer range and short range depth-sensing cameras for the robotic operating system. In order to get a camera, please visit:  intel.com/realsense/getacamera

![](https://github.com/PercATI/RealSense_ROS/blob/master/img/R200_on_turtlebot.png?raw=true)

See more details at: intel.com/realsense/software
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
